top_comments.comment: I love how Pearl is sooo annoyed stringing up her base beecause of the falling snow and Iskall is oblivious with buttoning up his entire base because of spawning mobs.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I feel like if you used cobbled and mossy stairs, it might be able to add to the entrance to the bubble elevator

The video thumbnail made me think you had used a nether portal above your base entrance instead of the geode blocks.  Both would look cool there!  Also, it needs some waterfalls or something to give it more life / movement.
